body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jeffrey Jones and the customer's name is Maria Torres.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Jeffrey Jones and I'm with Phat Hogs, your premier motorcycle dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Jeffrey, I'm Maria Torres. I’m just looking for some information on your motorcycles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Maria! What kind of motorcycle are you interested in? We have a wide range of options available.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking for something that is good for long rides. I’ve always wanted to own a cruiser.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Cruisers are fantastic for long rides! I can definitely help you with that. If you don't mind me asking, could you provide me with your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course! My zip code is nine zero one two three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Maria! And just to confirm, could I also get your phone number for follow-up purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure! It's five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, I have your information noted down. We have some excellent cruiser models that I think you'll love. Would you like to set up an appointment for a test ride?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, that sounds perfect! I’m really excited about it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Wonderful! I’ll arrange that for you. Thank you for your time today, Maria. I look forward to helping you find your dream motorcycle!
